body.p:
St. Louis Mo --
Decr 21st 1861 --
Thos H. Leas
Company "C" Engineers
Sir

Your favor of the 11th inst has just come to hand, and in answer to your request, I can state most cheerfully, that during the time your men or duty with me in Boston Harbor I was favorably impressed with your Activity and intelligence displayed in drilling and disciplining the men enlisted in the company and hope that your services
will be fully appreciated by the proper authority --

Very Respectfully
Your obt. Servt.
Jas B. McPherson
Lt. Col. A. D. C --

I very cheefully endorse Col McPhersons statement within --
A, H, Brownloe
Col of Engineers
West Point N. Y.
June 30. 1863
